channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OH
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OH

item.title: Report E-2023100243
item.description:
Report E-2023100243

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-12T15:12:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-09
  • City: UHRICHSVILLE
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal XUR experienced an approximate 1-cup release of UN3084 Kleen MCT411 from a 5-gallon poly pail. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and advised terminal personnel conducted cleanup and placed the damaged pail of product into a 35-gallon metal drum. The pail and material released were correctly containerized into a 55-gallon poly drum. The 35-gallon empty contaminated metal drum was placed into a separate 55-gallon poly drum. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report E-2023100223
item.description:
Report E-2023100223

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-12T15:12:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-27
  • City: WILMINGTON
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On September 27, 2023, one (1) 5-gallon pail of UN3098 was dropped by a forklift and released approximately five (5) gallons to the trailer interior and pavement beneath. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Thin Line Environmental (TLE) to remediate the impacted site. TLE personnel deployed poly sheeting, pH neutralizers, soda ash, granular absorbents, and pad absorbents to theUN3098-impacted areas and collected them with hand tools. TLE personnel cut out the impacted wood debris from the trailer and after collection of waste and debris flushed the trailer. All spent absorbents and debris were collected into two (2) lined 35-gallon poly drums, one with the impacted, diluted pail inside and the other with miscellaneous waste and debris, along with a lined 55-gallon poly drum containing mixed waste and cleanup debris.

item.description:
Report E-2023100189

  • City: COLUMBUS
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into one of the metal 55 gallon drums of resin (un1866) releasing 2 gallons of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.

item.title: Report X-2023090608
item.description:
Report X-2023090608

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-08
  • City: GROVEPORT
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package received an Inbound scan at 8:00am, and a Status Code 15 entered in at 8:16am. DescribePack: The top of the lid on one bottle was severed off, the threaded part of the lid is in tact.. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was put into large clear durable bag.

item.title: Report X-2023090599
item.description:
Report X-2023090599

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-08
  • City: GROVE CITY
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Certified personnel were notified of a distressed package, which was pulled from the system. Leakage was contained to the box. Package was placed in a lined red tote. DescribePack: One of the bottles had a crack in the bottom allowing for leakage. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Pads and neutralizing powder were used soak up the liquid and placed in a lined red tote.

item.title: Report X-2023090597
item.description:
Report X-2023090597

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-08
  • City: GROVE CITY
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Certified personnel were notified of a distressed package, which was pulled from the system. Leakage was contained to the box. Package was placed in a lined red tote. DescribePack: Package was discovered wet and upon inspection, the caps were found loose allowing for leakage. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Caps were tightened to stop further leaking

item.title: Report X-2023090594
item.description:
Report X-2023090594

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-07
  • City: PERRYSBURG
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was found 9-7 at 9p in the unload area, carton was wet and was brought to QA for inspection DescribePack: inner containers had loose lids which caused internal leakage DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: ppe was used to contain package in a plastic hazmat bag which was then placed in a sealed plastic tote

item.title: Report X-2023090582
item.description:
Report X-2023090582

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-07
  • City: TWINSBURG
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found damaged and was put into a tote for damage processing. DescribePack: The lid of one of the cans was dented which caused the lid to come off causing leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was put into a tote to mitigate the effects of the release.
